!Trader Alexandria: Welcome! Thank you for visiting our luxury shop today. We're pleased to offer a great many high-end goods that you won't find anywhere else. Please have a look around and see what catches your eye. Oh, one thing more . . . I hope it's not an inconvenience, but we don't accept cash anymore. If you see something you absolutely must have, we ask that you pay for it in *crystals*. If you're in the market for some excellent weapons, my husband here will be happy to help you.
